name: Interactive-crypto-handbook
tagline: An Interactive Way To Illustrate Modern Cryptography for IoT
body:
## Interactive Cryptography Handbook

This is a quick tour for cryptography in chinese

Hope the interactive style could help you quickly capture the ideas behind modern cryptography 

在這份教學中會以python 和 javascript兩個語言來呈現相關概念

1. [Basics](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/00_Basics.ipynb)

2. [Symmetric Cipher](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/01_Symmetric_Key.ipynb)

3. [Asymmetric Cipher - RSA](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/02_Asymmetric_RSA.ipynb)

4. [Asymmetric Cipher - ECC](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/03_Asymmetric_ECC.ipynb)

5. [Asymmetric Cipher - Pairing](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/05_Asymmetric_Pairing_2.ipynb)

6. [Hash](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/06_Hash.ipynb)

Appendix:

a. [Modular Arithmetic](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/00_Modular_Arithmetics.ipynb)

b. [Classical Cipher](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/phonchi/Interactive-Crypto-HandBook/blob/master/01_Classical.ipynb)

Reference:
[js](demo.html)

[js2](https://jswebcrypto.azurewebsites.net/demo.html#/)

Nacl in HW

http://eprint.iacr.org/2016/330.pdf

ECC: 

http://www.johannes-bauer.com/compsci/ecc/

https://blog.cloudflare.com/a-relatively-easy-to-understand-primer-on-elliptic-curve-cryptography/

https://www.nayuki.io/page/cryptographic-primitives-in-plain-python

https://cryptography.io/en/latest/


http://jdege.us/crypto-python/index.html

http://www.laurentluce.com/posts/python-and-cryptography-with-pycrypto/
